Frontier Days raffle schedule

3
Hips
Thursday, August 10th, 2017, 3:23:00 AM

Good news, Platinum folks! We now have a schedule for the Frontier Days raffles.

Raffles are going to be set up all along North Ring Road sometime in the morning. They will begin to draw on Friday evening.

Fri 8/11 * Poker dice (1 winner) 8PM EST * Pet Lizards (4 winners) 830PM EST * Elemental Ring (1 winner, pick fire, ice, or lightning) 9PM EST * Opaque vultite falchion (SWDW) (1 winner) 930PM EST

Sat, 8/12 * Voodoo doll (1 winner) 12PM EST * Translucent white broadsword (SWCW) (1 winner) 4PM EST * Pet Kittens (2 winners) 8PM EST * 5x Returning weapon(hammer) (1 winner) 10PM EST

Q Crew
Friday, August 11th, 2017, 1:11:50 AM

Also it was said you don't have to be present, so it won't overlap with anything in Ta'Illistim on Saturday.

Hips
Friday, August 11th, 2017, 1:52:12 PM

Bump to remind Plat folks that half of the Frontier Days raffles draw later tonight!

Fri 8/11 * Poker dice (1 winner) 8PM EST * Pet Lizards (4 winners) 830PM EST * Elemental Ring (1 winner, pick fire, ice, or lightning) 9PM EST * Opaque vultite falchion (SWDW) (1 winner) 930PM EST
